author: Bloomberg News
title: Trump wants to ease advice telling people to stay at home to curb economic rout from COVID-19
description: Trump and contingent of aides want to ensure economic damage from nationwide 'social distancing' doesn't outweigh potential toll from virus itself
content: President Donald Trump began talking privately late last week about reopening the nation, despite the swiftly rising number of coronavirus cases and against the advice of health professionals, because he’s worried about the economic damage from an extended sh… [+4971 chars]
